creditline: Lent by James Tigerman, Big Plan Company
description: stand with burner; water bowl, chafing dish and cover wavy ribbon like edge on dish; heavy large blooming flowers above each leg and corresponding on cover; leaves at edge of dish, hammered bowl and basin of dish; four intertwining stems form legs
dimension: H.10-1/2 x W.18-3/16 x D.11 in., overall
